text: Bubble Shooter is a puzzle game. The original version of the game was created for Microsoft Windows by Absolutist Games in 2000. Since 2000, original version has been improved some times and many clones of the game has been released. Bubble Shooter Deluxe version 1.6 was released in April 2004. This version is supported by many operating systems. == Gameplay == The player wants to join bubbles with the same coloration into one larger group. If he manages to connect 3 or more bubbles, the whole bubble cluster disappears. The player's task is to get rid of all bubbles on the screen in this way and advance to the next round.
